snippet: A senior American military commander is expected to visit Pakistan this month to discuss the investigation into an exchange of border fire in November that killed 24 Pakistani soldiers.
abstract: A senior American military commander is expected to visit Pakistan this month to discuss the investigation into an exchange of border fire in November that killed 24 Pakistani soldiers.
lead_paragraph: The head of the American military's Central Command is expected to visit Pakistan this month to discuss the investigations into an exchange of fire along the Afghan border in November that killed 24 Pakistani soldiers and in effect damaged relations between the two countries.

headline.main: U.S. Sending Head of Central Command to Repair Pakistan Ties

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
